entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
